name: Restaurant Go Round
description:
[[[ PRESS FULLSCREEN TO FIX THE GAME ]]]

You work at a restaurant where the food will move at the table that rotates.

Serve the customer with menu you had and get the High Score!

How to Play

1 - Press 1 to serve Ice Cream. if you succesfully serve an Ice Cream to a customer, you get 5 points. The cooldown of an Ice Cream is 5 seconds.

2 - Press 2 to serve Burger. if you succesfully serve an Burger to a customer, you get 10 points. The cooldown of a Burger is 10 seconds.

3 - Press 3 to serve Salad. if you succesfully serve an Salad to a customer, you get 15 points. The cooldown of a Salad is 15 seconds.

4 - Press 4 to serve Cake. if you succesfully serve an Cake to a customer, you get 20 points. The cooldown of a Cake is 20 seconds.

5 - Press 5 to serve Turkey. if you succesfully serve an Turkey to a customer, you get 25 points. The cooldown of an Turkey is 25 seconds.

You can only serve a menu each 3 seconds.

Credits

- All Assets except Music is made by Kenney.
- Music is made by Dova-Syndrome
